trans-unit.source: Represents an individual <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> column header.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether the user can click this column header to sort the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> by the associated column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户是否可以单击此列标题以进行排序<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>按关联的列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can click this column header to sort the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> by the associated column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以单击此列标题以进行排序<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>按关联的列; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.CanUserSort*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> associated with this column header.
The column associated with this column header.
Gets the key that references the style for displaying column headers during a header drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于引用在标头拖动操作过程中显示列标题的样式的键。

trans-unit.source: The style key for floating column headers.
Gets the key that references the style for the drop location indicator during a header drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在标头拖动操作期间引用放置位置指示器的样式的键。

trans-unit.source: The style key for the drop location indicator.
trans-unit.target: 放置位置指示器样式键。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display position of the column associated with this column header relative to the other columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此列标题相对于其他列中关联的列的显示位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The display position of associated column relative to the other columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相对于其他列中的关联列的显示位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.DisplayIndex*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the column associated with this column header is prevented from scrolling horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已阻止此列标题与关联的列在水平滚动。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated column is prevented from scrolling horizontally; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果关联的列已阻止滚动水平空间。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.IsFrozen*> dependency property.
To be added.
Builds the visual tree for the column header when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 应用新模板时，会生成列标题的可视化树。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每当应用程序代码或内部的过程中，如重新生成布局处理过程中，调用会调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event and initiates sorting.
This method is called when the header is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击标头时，调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this column header.
A new automation peer for this column header.
trans-unit.target: 此列标题新自动化对等方。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref>时发生此控件不再接收鼠标事件消息的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>鼠标指针位于此控件下按下鼠标左键时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>当鼠标指针位于此控件用户释放鼠标左键时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>鼠标指针移到此元素上时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to paint the column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>用于绘制列标题分隔符线。

trans-unit.source: The brush used to paint column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制列标题行分隔符的画笔。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the user interface (UI) visibility of the column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标头分隔线的列的用户界面 (UI) 可见性。

trans-unit.source: The UI visibility of the column header separator lines.
trans-unit.target: UI 线的可见性列标头分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorVisibility*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> is sorted by the associated column and whether the column values are in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>按关联的列以及列的值是否按升序或降序排序。

trans-unit.source: The sort direction of the column or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if unsorted.
trans-unit.target: 列的排序方向或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果未排序。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SortDirection*> dependency property.
To be added.
